issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

fields.summary: Walrus bucket listing error message logged frequently

comments.body:
I have this fixed in TP I think. Need to bring over if this should be fixed
for 3.4.1.


On Mon, Oct 21, 2013 at 3:40 PM, Charles Gelinas (JIRA) <




-- 

*    Neil Soman *


*    Co-founder & Director of Engineering*
This will be fixed when we merge TP back into testing.
[~neil], this is resolved, correct? I haven't seen any such errors in the logs, so I assume it is resolved. I am closing it now. Please re-open if we see it again.
